css_variables:
--z-index-overlay); /* Ensure it's above other content */
    background
z_index_selectors: .site-header.universal-page-header .header-right .nav-link
.z-room-buttons

/* Ensure all modals have consistent high z-index */
.modal-overlay,
#detailedItemModal,
#quantityModal,
.admin-modal-overlay

/* Enhanced Sale Badge */
.sale-badge

/* Admin navbar should stay above regular content but below modals */
.admin-tab-navigation
.z-image-viewer

/* Left Section: Logo and Navigation */
.site-header.universal-page-header .header-left

/* Overlay container for interactive areas */
  body.mode-fullscreen #landingPage

/* Room Modal Header - Use centralized z-index */
.room-modal-header
.structure-analysis-section [title]:hover::before
.site-header.universal-page-header .nav-link

/* Search Results Modal */
#searchModal

.back-button-container,
    .back-to-main-button
.z-door-areas
.room-title-overlay
.z-room-modal-header

/* Room Title/Description Overlay Styles - Ensure proper loading in modal context */
.room-title-overlay
.item-icon:hover
.z-content-overlay
.site-header.universal-page-header .search-bar
.room-header-overlay
.site-header.universal-page-header .welcome-message
.modal-z-highest

.site-header.universal-page-header .auth-links,
.site-header.universal-page-header .user-menu
.modal-z-medium
.z-room-modals
.admin-modal-overlay
.modal-z-high
